channel.title: Adding The Quest Help Into clickingmost
channel.description: I figured out the case. This is no more.

item.title: Adding The Quest Help Into clickingmost
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:8, topic:347021”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=443398.msg3255877#msg3255877 date=1278101483]

Yeah, i tried adding a quest once and failed epically
[/quote]Haha. I pretty much have everything set, except for it showing the help when you click on it in the quest tab…grrr.

Nice, see when i tried to add a quest, I:

  1. Fucked up all my npc dialogues.
  2. Couldn’t get the quest help to show up.
  3. The name of the quest would only appear after you finished it.[/quote]
    Ah. Yup, only having trouble with number 2 on that list.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding The Quest Help Into clickingmost

[/quote]Haha. I pretty much have everything set, except for it showing the help when you click on it in the quest tab…grrr.[/quote]

item.title: Adding The Quest Help Into clickingmost
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:4, topic:347021”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=443398.msg3255862#msg3255862 date=1278101210]

Go into the game and click right where that text is going to be.

Then, look in your server console.

It should say something like

“Button = ####” or something.

That’s your case number.

Man, I ain’t that dumb. That was the first thing I did, and yet, nothing.
Thanks anyways…
[/quote]

Yeah, but I don’t assume anyone in this community to be smart :P[/quote]
Ah yes, that is understandable, lol. I’ve been trying to teach myself, but I cannot find the Case it should be -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Adding The Quest Help Into clickingmost
